item.title: Pro-Trump senator meets Chinese Premier Li with U.S. executives
item.description: U.S. Republican Senator Steve Daines met Chinese Premier Li Qiang in Beijing with a group of seven American executives on Sunday.

item.title: SEC to see exodus as hundreds take Trump's buyout offers: Reuters
item.description: The SEC is facing a staff exodus amid President Donald Trump and Elon Musk's efforts to remake the U.S. government, five sources said.
